name: Scraper: First Strike
description: Scraper: First Strike® is a VR shooter game with RPG and exploration elements. Created and Imagined by Jim Ivon, Scraper: First Strike® uses UE4 to deliver gamers into the year 2076, where they must battle renegade robots in high-rise skyscraper complexes.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 or newer Processor: Intel i5-4590/AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970/AMD Radeon R9 290 or greater Additional Notes: USB Ports 3x USB 3.0 ports, plus 1x USB 2.0 Port, Compatible HDMI 1.3 Video Output
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 or newer Processor: Intel i5-4590/AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970/AMD Radeon R9 290 or greater Additional Notes: USB Ports 3x USB 3.0 ports, plus 1x USB 2.0 Port, Compatible HDMI 1.3 Video Output
